text: Thumboli Kadappuram is a 1995 Indian Malayalam film, written by Unni Joseph, directed by Jayaraj, starring Manoj K. Jayan and Priya Raman in the lead roles. http://www.nthwall.com/ml/movie/Thumboli-Kadappuram-1995/9465401564 ==Cast== *Manoj K. Jayan as Williams *Priya Raman as Mary *Vijayaraghavan as Methrinju *Silk Smitha as Clara *Rajan P. Dev as Solomon *Indrans as Pushpangathan *Kuthiravattam Pappu as Gee Varghese *Kunjandi as Vareed *Kozhikode Narayanan Nair as Priest *Jose Prakash as Antony *Zainuddin *Adoor Bhavani *Adoor Pankajam as Kakkamma *Eliyas Babu as Philippose *Jose Pellissery as Valappad Velayudhan *Kaduvakulam Antony *Ramu *Augustine as Pashanam *Santhosh *Reena *Spadikam George as Rhomichayan *Philomina as Chanchamma *Benny *Sonia Baiju Kottarakkara as Kochu Thresia *Rani Laurius *Thodupuzha Vasanthy *Prem Kumar as Chalappan *K. R. Vatsala *Ragini *Baburaj *Kozhikode Sarada == Soundtrack == The film's soundtrack contains 5 songs, all composed by Salil Chowdhary, with lyrics by O. N. V. Kurup. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! # !! Title !! Singer(s) |- | 1 | "Kaathil Thenmazhayaay" (M) | K. J. Yesudas |- | 2 | "Kaathil Thenmazhayaay" (F) | K. S.
